title: rock
description: Rock music is a genre that originated in the 1950s and is characterized by a strong beat, simple melodies, and often revolves around the electric guitar. It has evolved through various subgenres such as classic rock, punk rock, alternative rock, and hard rock. Rock music typically features a combination of electric guitars, bass guitar, drums, and vocals. It has had a significant impact on popular culture and has produced many iconic bands and artists over the decades.
